resources.string: Please fill in the IP Address.
Please restart the playback for the changes to take effect.

This app can stream audio from your linux PC using PulseAudio(a sound system which makes Linux PCs capable of playing audio).

To stream audio, first enable the PulseAudio module by running the shell script(called pashare) provided along with the app.(Download it from this website if you don\'t have it)

Next, go back to the main view of this app and enter your computer\'s local IP address. As it is assumed that you will be using the shell script from my repository, the default port to connect to is set to 8000. But, if you want to connect via some other port for any reason, you can change the port the script uses by opening pashare script in a text editor and editing the port argument and set the default port used to the same port number in the app settings.

After entering the IP address, click on the play button to play audio.

To stop streaming audio, press the stop button.

Normally, the app is set to follow the phone\'s dark mode settings but if you want to use light mode or dark mode all time or enable dark mode only when battery saver is on, change the dark mode setting in the app settings.
